Continue reading Crystal Acupuncture
cleaned_text: What is crystal acupuncture? We have all heard of treatments with leeches and acupuncture. Jewel or crystal acupuncture work off the basis of acupuncture. They activate flows of energy, dissolve tensions and open up blockades. It is a very high form of therapy that does not break of puncture the skin. Sometimes deep blockades can only be reached by the tapping or rubbing of stones.
